name: Resistance Network Formation
description: Establishing decentralized resistance networks to counter IDC influence and maintain sovereignty.

cards.title: Forming Secure Communication Channels
cards.description: Developing private, encrypted, and decentralized means of information exchange.
bulletpoints: Understanding OPSEC and INFOSEC for secure communications.
Leveraging decentralized platforms and blockchain for censorship resistance.
Using offline methods such as dead drops and couriers for high-security ops.
cards.summaryText: Master OPSEC, use decentralized channels, and fall back to offline relays when heat is high.

cards.title: Building Decentralized Support Systems
cards.description: Creating local and global self-sufficient resistance communities.
bulletpoints: Establishing parallel economies outside IDC control.
Coordinating autonomous action through decentralized consensus models.
cards.summaryText: Build parallel economies, share intel locally, and coordinate via decentralized consensus.

cards.title: Counteracting IDC Surveillance
cards.description: Mitigating exposure to elite-controlled surveillance systems.
bulletpoints: Techniques for digital anonymity and obfuscation.
Avoiding biometric tracking and AI-driven profiling.
Using misinformation tactics to disrupt data collection operations.
cards.summaryText: Stay anonymous, dodge biometric profiling, and seed misinfo to jam their surveillance net.
